abort.wrong_account: Reauthentication must use the same account

error.invalid_code_format: Code must be 8 characters: 4 letters followed by 4 digits (example: ABCD-1234 or ABCD1234)

otp.description: We sent a verification code to your Level Home app. Enter the code in format ABCD-1234.
otp.title: Enter verification code

reauth_confirm.description: The Level Lock integration needs to re-authenticate your account
reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]

data_description.contact_info: Enter your email address or phone number (e.g., user@example.com or +1234567890)

user.description: Enter your email address or phone number to receive a verification code.
user.title: Connect Level account

verify.description:
Please open your Level Home mobile app and enter the verification code: **{user_code}**

After entering the code in your mobile app, click Submit below to continue.
verify.title: Verify on your mobile device
